verses.roman:
su-viviktaṁ tava praśnaṁ
mayaitad api dhārayet
sanātanaṁ brahma-guhyaṁ
paraṁ brahmādhigacchati

synonyms: sa-viviktam—clearly elucidated; tava—your; praśnam—question; mayā—by Me; etat—this; api—even; dhārayet—fixes his attention upon; sanātanam—eternal; brahma-guhyam—secret of the Vedas; param—supreme; brahma—the Absolute Truth; adhigacchati—he attains.
translation: Anyone who fixes his attention on these clear answers to your questions will attain to the eternal, confidential goal of the Vedas—the Supreme Absolute Truth.
